entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 1 "The "You First" Way"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 1 "The "You First" Way"
media:group.media:description: Have you ever raced with someone? Maybe you wanted to be the first to the swings, or the first to play with a toy. We all like to be first! A long time ago Jesus had something special to say about being first. [Jesus said,] If anyone wants to be first, he must be the very last. MARK 9:35, NIV. We serve others when we let them go first.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 2 "A Big Storm"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 2 "A Big Storm"
media:group.media:description: Have you ever been really, really scared? Maybe a big dog came near you, or you couldnt find your mother in a store. Everyone feels afraid once in a while. Who helps you feel safe? "The Lord is with me; I will not be afraid." PSALM 118:6, NIV. We can help others be safe.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 3 "The Woman At The Well"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 3 "The Woman At The Well"
media:group.media:description: Have you ever been thirsty? So thirsty you couldnt wait to get a drink? One day when He was traveling, Jesus became very thirsty. Would someone get Him a drink? "Tell how much God has done for you." LUKE 8:39, NIV. We help others when we tell them about Jesus.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 4 "Breakfast With Jesus"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 4 "Breakfast With Jesus"
media:group.media:description: Do you like surprises? a present? to go someplace special with your family? a sweet treat? Everyone likes surprises! Jesus liked them too. In our story today He gave His disciples two surprises! We help others because we want to be like Jesus. " [Jesus said,] You should do as I have done for you." JOHN 13:15, NIV.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 5 "Anytime, Anywhere"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 5 "Anytime, Anywhere"
media:group.media:description: What is the most quiet place you know? Is it a special place you like outside? Is it your own special thinking spot? Jesus had a favorite quiet place too.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 6 "Jesus Reads In Church"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 6 "Jesus Reads In Church"
media:group.media:description: What is your favorite thing about Sabbath School and church? Do you like the songs? The stories? Do you like to be with your friends? Jesus liked to go to church on Sabbath too!

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 7 "Healed At Last!"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 7 "Healed At Last!"
media:group.media:description: Have you ever been sick for a whole day? for two or three days? You probably wanted to get well! The woman in our story today had been sick for a long, long time. She had been sick for 12 years!

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 8 "One Said "Thank You""

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 8 "One Said "Thank You""
media:group.media:description: Have you ever given something special to someone who didn't say thank you? How did that make you feel? Once Jesus helped some men get well. What do you think they did? "God, I will give you thanks forever." PSALM 30:12, NIV. We worship Jesus when we thank Him.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 9 "The Poor Widow's Offering"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 9 "The Poor Widow's Offering"
media:group.media:description: Have you ever watched how people give their offerings in church? The money may be placed, dropped, plopped, or tossed in the collection plate. How did it happen in Jesus' time? "God loves a cheerful giver." 2 CORINTHIANS 9:7, NIV.We worship God when we give cheerfully.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 10 "Jesus Goes To A Party"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 10 "Jesus Goes To A Party"
media:group.media:description: Do you like parties? Do you like to eat yummy food and play games with your family and friends? Jesus liked to have fun, too! He liked to visit with His family and His friends. "Burst into songs of joy together." ISAIAH 52:9, NIV. We have fun with our family and friends.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 11 "Follow Me"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 11 "Follow Me"
media:group.media:description: When you hear some good news, what do you do? Do you tell someone about it? Maybe you like to tell your brother or sister. Maybe you want to tell a friend. It's fun to share good news! "You are my friends." JOHN 15:14, NIV. Jesus calls us to be His friends

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 12 "Special Friends"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 12 "Special Friends"
media:group.media:description: Do you have a special friend? What do you do with your special friend? Did you know Jesus had special friends? "A friend loves at all times." PROVERBS 17:17, NIV Friends always care for each other.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 13 "A Little Boy Shares"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 2 Episode 13 "A Little Boy Shares"
media:group.media:description: Have you ever been away from home with nothing to eat? One day many people were far away from home at mealtime. But Jesus had a surprise for them! "Do not forget . . .to share with others." HEBREWS 13:16, NIV. Friends share with others.
